api_list.name: Remove User Access From Private Script
api_list.description: It removes a specified username from a private script access list. Cookies must be valid and the indicator url must be a private script url.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tradingview-rest.p.rapidapi.com/remove-access/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tradingview-rest.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Cookie
api_list.description: It helps to get your account's session id and session id sign values from the cookie header after successful login. The cookies are valid for 30 days. You need to change your session values every 30 days. If you don't want to give your TradingView username and password to us please check documentation for the other way to get session values.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tradingview-rest.p.rapidapi.com/get-cookie/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tradingview-rest.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Give User Access To Private Script
api_list.description: It automatically gives the user access to a provided private script/indicator. Needs a valid cookie(sessionid and sessionid_sign). Check the documentation to get a valid cookie.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tradingview-rest.p.rapidapi.com/give-access/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tradingview-rest.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
